description: A quick, practical guide to Conversational Marketing.

buildup.text: Conversational marketing uses chatbots, messaging apps, and live chat to engage in real time.

discovery.text: Conversations feel personal. Forms feel bureaucratic. People prefer talking over filling.

quiz.question: Why does conversational marketing outperform traditional web forms?
